We develop modern mobile applications for all the leading platforms, utilizing the late:
technologies in application development. Our extensive experience of technologies anc
software implementations for a wide range of industries enables us to design innovativ
unique solutions, always maintaining user friendliness.

With the help of well-functioning web applications and IT systems, we can improve org:
processes. Devatus has extensive experience in the development of complex tools fora
range of industry- and energy sectors. We are able to provide customers with agile softv
development methods utilizing visually stunning user interfaces, as well as the appropr
implementation.

Ina modern information system projects, it is almost always necessary to integrate to e
systems. With our long and diverse experience, we have a solid record when it comes to
information system integration projects. Customization of the integration interfaces are
achilles heel of integration projects, hence the different parties’ co-operation skills are c
Having strong people skills is one of our strengths, and we have often worked as the coo
party in complex IT system integration projects.

We utilize the latest and most advanced methods and tools to help us implement even
demanding digital development projects.

Initially, work was often done at home or at the customer's office, common
premises were acquired about half a year after the establishment of the
company. The growing company currently has more than 30 employees and
the business is booming. The secret of success is in the attitudes of the team -
they work with a ‘can do’ attitude with feet firmly on the ground, without
hierarchy or traditional compartments.
